channel.title: MTP V3 Development Team
channel.description:
TY scape-java for moving :)
MTP is a project insanity based pking server. I like servers that people can join and be pking within under 5 minutes. That is how MTP is. You log on, type ::master and buy your gear and go pking. MTP got boring (for me) so I thought it could use some updates, This is why im looking for a development team to help out. Our team is going to add several big updates (ideas which I will mention later) and then I will host it 24/7 again and we will get back all our old players and have 100+ always online again.
If you want to see some pictures then you should visit the download topic for MTP V2 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457959.0.html
What I have done so far for updates: Added pvp artifacts into drops and an NPC that will take them for money
What I want to be done: Fixing NPC drops Fixing barrows kill count (barrows is working but when you kill one of the barrows brothers, it doesnt add to kill count 100% new prayer book (this is what i mainly need help with) Added some NPC based minigames like GWD for another source of money besides pking Webclient
So ya I need 1 or 2 client or server coders, basically people to just help me with things when I get stuck, and I will be hosting 24/7
Apply with this:
Name: Age: Experience: Can you do any of the things that I want to be done? MSN:

item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Jjikolip, post:26, topic:366746”]Name:Coby
Age:16
Experience: 2-4 years’s coding/jarring!
Can you do any of the things that I want to be done? yes i could add killstreaksystem + more new point system where they can buy armour like rune what reflile every 5 min
MSN:ice-age2103@hotmail.com[/quote]Last post was in 2010, please check the dates.

Read full topic

item.title: MTP V3 Development Team
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“sebas333, post:22, topic:366746”]Name:Seb
Age: 15
Experience: 2 years Exploitation/Various white-hat hacking experience (Defence/Good guy stuff), Various Java Coding since the age of 13, Minor PHP/HTML knowledge, Coded Java Based Installers. Bad with adding multi threaded Gui’s (Sorry)
Can you do any of the things that I want to be done?
Drive-By Based webclient’s, Will need help adding a progress bar if necessary(Can Implement it to download the Desktop version of the client automatically while loading the webclient, The folder can appear anywhere on their pc, and even run the run.bat file)
I can help add various minigames and make sure you servers will be checked over for possible exploits due to hackers.
I can also supply a dedicated server, solely licensed to me if needed:
250gb HD
Intel® Core™ 2 CPU 6600 @2.40GHz
4 GB of RAM

MSN:lilsnoopsebas@hotmail.com[/quote]

I actually could really use the dedi and also a webclient to download to desktop and run sounds pretty good. Message me on msn

So basically ill take everyone but just message me on msn: marcisboss@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PvPTurf PvPTurf
item.description:
@PvPTurf wrote:

Name: Sam

Age: 13

Experience: 1 year, hosted PvP Turf, and managed ForeverPkers.

Can you do any of the things that I want to be done?: No, but I purchased Galkon’s Remedy Client for $50. I’m great at GFX, and I’ve got enough money on PayPal to run a server if you’d want to host this. I’m beast at organizing areas, and coming up with designs, and ideas for updates.

MSN: penetration10@gmail.com

Notes: My brother is Adobe Dreamweaver certified, and runs a gaming ladder site.
